original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Vessantaravagga
analyzed: vessantara vagga

original: 8. Dhammābhisamayapañha
analyzed: dhamma abhisamaya pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te sammā paṭipajjanti, tesaṁ sabbesaṁyeva dhammābhisamayo hoti, udāhu kassaci na hotī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ye te sammā paṭipajjanti tesam sabbesayā iva dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti udāhu kassaci na hoti iti

original: “Kassaci, mahārāja, hoti, kassaci na hotī”ti.
analyzed: kassaci mahā rāja hoti kassaci na hoti iti

original: “Kassa, bhante, hoti, kassa na hotī”ti?
analyzed: kassa bhante hoti kassa na hoti iti

original: “Tiracchānagatassa, mahārāja, suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti, pettivisayūpapannassa
analyzed: tiracchāna gatassa mahā rāja su paṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti pettivisaya upapannassa

original: … micchādiṭṭhikassa … kuhakassa … mātughātakassa … pitughātakassa … arahantaghātakassa
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhikassa kuhakassa mātu ghātakassa pitu ghātakassa arahanta ghātakassa

original: … saṅghabhedakassa … lohituppādakassa … theyyasaṁvāsakassa … titthiyapakkantassa
analyzed: saṅgha bhedakassa lohituppādakassa theyyasavāsakassa titthiya pakkantassa

original: … bhikkhunidūsakassa … terasannaṁ garukāpattīnaṁ aññataraṁ āpajjitvā avuṭṭhitassa
analyzed: bhikkhu nidūsakassa terasannam garuka āpattīnam aññataram āpajjitvā a vuṭṭhitassa

original: … paṇḍakassa … ubhatobyañjanakassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti … yopi
analyzed: paṇḍakassa ubhatobyañjanakassa suppaṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti yaḥ pi

original: manussadaharako ūnakasattavassiko, tassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
analyzed: manussa daharakaḥ ūnaka satta vassiko tassa su paṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Imesaṁ kho, mahārāja, soḷasannaṁ puggalānaṁ suppaṭipannānampi dhammābhisamayo na hotī”ti.
analyzed: imesam kho mahā rāja soḷasannam puggalānam suppaṭipannānam pi dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te pannarasa puggalā viruddhāyeva, tesaṁ dhammābhisamayo hotu
analyzed: bhante nāgasena ye te pannarasa puggalāḥ viruddhāya iva tesam dhamma abhisamayaḥ hotu

original: vā mā vā hotu, atha kena kāraṇena manussadaharakassa ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi
analyzed: vā mā vā hotu atha kena kāraṇena manussa daharakassa ūnaka satta vassikassa suppaṭipannassa api

original: dhammābhisamayo na hoti?
analyzed: dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Ettha tāva pañho bhavati ‘nanu nāma daharakassa na rāgo hoti, na doso hoti, na moho
analyzed: ettha tāva pañhaḥ bhavati nanu nāma daharakassa na rāgaḥ hoti na dosaḥ hoti na moho

original: hoti, na māno hoti, na micchādiṭṭhi hoti, na arati hoti, na kāmavitakko hoti, amissito
analyzed: hoti na mānaḥ hoti na micchādiṭṭhi hoti na arati hoti na kāma vitakkaḥ hoti a missitaḥ

original: kilesehi, so nāma daharako yutto ca patto ca arahati ca cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedhena paṭivijjhitun’”ti.
analyzed: kilesehi so nāma daharakaḥ yutto ca patto ca arahati ca cattāri saccāni eka ppaṭivedhena paṭivijjhitunti

original: “Taññevettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yenāhaṁ kāraṇena bhaṇāmi ‘ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hotī’ti.
analyzed: tat na eva īttha mahā rāja yena aham kāraṇena bhaṇāmi ūnaka satta vassikassa suppaṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: Yadi, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassiko rajanīye rajjeyya, dussanīye dusseyya, mohanīye
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikaḥ rajanīye rajjeyya dussanīye dusseyya mohanīye

original: muyheyya, madanīye majjeyya, diṭṭhiṁ vijāneyya, ratiñca aratiñca vijāneyya, kusalākusalaṁ
analyzed: muyheyya madanīye majjeyya diṭṭhim vijāneyya ratiñca a ratiñca vijāneyya kusala akusala

original: vitakkeyya, bhaveyya tassa dhammābhisamayo, api ca, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassikassa
analyzed: vitakkeyya bhaveyya tassa dhamma abhisamayaḥ api ca mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikassa

original: cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ, asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu
analyzed: cittam abalam dubbalam parittam appam thokam mandam avibhūta asaṅkhatā nibbāna dhātu

original: garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī.
analyzed: garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī

original: Ūnakasattavassiko, mahārāja, tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti garukaṁ bhārikaṁ vipulaṁ mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ.
analyzed: ūnakasattavassikaḥ mahā rāja tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti garukam bhārikam vipulam mahatim asaṅkhatam nibbāna dhātum paṭivijjhitu

original: Yathā, mahārāja, sinerupabbatarājā garuko bhāriko vipulo mahanto, api nu kho taṁ,
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sineru pabbata rājā garukaḥ bhārikaḥ vipulaḥ mahantaḥ api nu khalu te

original: mahārāja, puriso attano pākatikena thāmabalavīriyena sakkuṇeyya sinerupabbatarājānaṁ uddharitun”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja purisaḥ attanaḥ pākatikena thāma bala vīriyena sakkuṇeyya sineru pabbata rājānam uddharitunti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇena, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena mahā rājā ati

original: “Dubbalattā, bhante, purisassa, mahantattā sinerupabbatarājassā”ti.
analyzed: dubbala ttā bhante purisassa mahanta ttā sineru pabbata rājassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ, asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikassa cittam abalam dubbalam parittam appam thokam mandam avibhūta asaṅkhatā nibbāna dhātu garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī

original: Ūnakasattavassiko tena dubbalena cittena parittena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti
analyzed: ūnaka satta vassikaḥ tena dubbalena cittena parittena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti

original: garukaṁ bhārikaṁ vipulaṁ mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ, tena kāraṇena
analyzed: garukam bhārikam vipulam mahatim asaṅkhatam nibbāna dhātum paṭivijjhitu tena kāraṇena

original: ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
analyzed: ūnaka satta vassikassa suppaṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, ayaṁ mahāpathavī dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā vitthiṇṇā
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja ayam mahā pathavī dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā vitthiṇṇā

original: vipulā mahantā, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja, mahāpathaviṁ sakkā parittakena udakabindukena
analyzed: vipulāḥ mahantāḥ api nu khalu ta mahā rāja mahā pathavim sakkā parittakena udaka bindukena

original: temetvā udakacikkhallaṁ kātun”ti?
analyzed: temetvā udaka cikkhallam kātunti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇena, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena mahā rājā ati

original: “Parittattā, bhante, udakabindussa, mahantattā mahāpathaviyā”ti.
analyzed: paritta ttā bhante udaka bindussa mahanta ttā mahā pathaviyā ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikassa cittam abalam dubbalam parittam appa

original: thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ, asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā
analyzed: thokam mandam avibhūta asaṅkhatā nibbāna dhātu dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā

original: vitthiṇṇā vipulā mahantā.
analyzed: vitthiṇṇā vipulā mahantā

original: Ūnakasattavassiko tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti
analyzed: ūnaka satta vassikaḥ tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti

original: mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ, tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa
analyzed: mahatim asaṅkhatam nibbāna dhātum paṭivijjhitu tena kāraṇena ūnaka satta vassikassa

original: suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
analyzed: su paṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, abaladubbalaparittaappathokamandaggi bhaveyya, api nu kho,
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja abala dubbala paritta appathoka mandaggi bhaveyya api nu kho

original: mahārāja, tāvatakena mandena agginā sakkā sadevake loke andhakāraṁ vidhamitvā ālokaṁ dassetun”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja tāvatakena mandena agginā sakkā sa devake loke andhakāram vidhamitvā ālokam dassetunti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇena, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena mahā rājā ati

original: “Mandattā, bhante, aggissa, lokassa mahantattā”ti.
analyzed: mandattā bhante aggissa lokassa mahantattā iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ, mahatā ca avijjandhakārena pihitaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikassa cittam abalam dubbalam parittam appam thokam mandam avibhūta mahatā ca avid andhakārena pihita

original: Tasmā dukkaraṁ ñāṇālokaṁ dassayituṁ, tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
analyzed: tasmā dukkaram ñāṇa ālokam dassayitu tena kāraṇena ūnaka satta vassikassa suppaṭipannassa api dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, āturo kiso aṇuparimitakāyo sālakakimi hatthināgaṁ tidhā
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja āturaḥ kisaḥ aṇu parimita kāyaḥ hatthi nāgam tidhā

original: pabhinnaṁ navāyataṁ tivitthataṁ dasapariṇāhaṁ aṭṭharatanikaṁ sakaṭṭhānamupagataṁ
analyzed: pabhinnam nava āyatam tivitthatam dasa pariṇāham aṭṭha ratanikam saka ṭṭhānam upagata

original: disvā gilituṁ parikaḍḍheyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, sālakakimi sakkuṇeyya taṁ hatthināgaṁ gilitun”ti?
analyzed: disvā gilitum parikaḍḍheyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja sālakakimi sakkuṇeyya tam hatthi nāgam gilitunti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kena kāraṇena, mahārājā”ti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena mahā rājā ati

original: “Parittattā, bhante, sālakakimissa, mahantattā hatthināgassā”ti.
analyzed: paritta ttā bhante sālakakimissa mahanta ttā hatthi nāgassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ, mahatī asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ūnaka satta vassikassa cittam abalam dubbalam parittam appam thokam mandam avibhūta mahatī asaṅkhatā nibbāna dhātu

original: So tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ
analyzed: saḥ tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti mahatim

original: nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ, tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi
analyzed: nibbāna dhātum paṭivijjhitu tena kāraṇena ūnaka satta vassikassa suppaṭipannassa api

original: dhammābhisamayo na hotī”ti.
analyzed: dhamma abhisamayaḥ na hoti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Dhammābhisamayapañho aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: dhamma abhisamaya pañhaḥ aṭṭhamo
